alert.note: Alert for Bell; Falls; McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 04 at 6:53PM CDT until September 04 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MCLENNAN...NORTHEASTERN BELL AND SOUTHWESTERN FALLS COUNTIES... At 653 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lott, or 15 miles northeast of Temple, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Temple, Marlin, Morgan`s Point Resort, Lorena, Troy, Bruceville-Eddy, Rosebud, Moody, Lott and Golinda. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
